name: NonacuteInpatientStay
title: Nonacute Inpatient Stay
description: ***This value set is a proxy for a UBREV value set. UBREV is not a code system in VSAC.*** This value set created for the purpose of identifying an nonacute inpatient stay for use in MSSP ACO readmission or preventable admission measures. Please note that use of this value set is not limited to MSSP ACO measures.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set created for the purpose of identifying an nonacute inpatient stay for use in MSSP ACO readmission or preventable admission measures.),(Data Element Scope: ClaimProcedure, ClaimItem.service, ClaimItem.revenue, Encounter.hospitalization, Procedure),(Inclusion Criteria: Nonacute inpatient stay via procedure or revenue billing codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Acute inpatient stays.)
